thread.title: Prog metal group Erra are touring with Silent Planet and Resolve this March
thread.title_full: Prog metal group Erra are touring with Silent Planet and Resolve this March

author: Lucas Radbourne
title: Prog metal group Erra are touring with Silent Planet and Resolve this March
text:
The Alabama outfit, touring in support of their sixth album Cure, will traverse the country alongside international guests Silent Planet (USA) and Resolve (FRA) across an eight-date national run. The local lineup features established and emerging acts from across Australia's heavy music landscape, each selected to complement the touring package. Erra Australian tour Thu 6 […] Words by Staff Writer
The Alabama outfit, touring in support of their sixth album Cure, will traverse the country alongside international guests Silent Planet (USA) and Resolve (FRA) across an eight-date national run.
The local lineup features established and emerging acts from across Australia's heavy music landscape, each selected to complement the touring package.
Erra Australian tour
Thu 6 Mar – Astor Theatre, Perth w/ Daybreak
Sat 8 Mar – Lion Arts Factory, Adelaide w/ Signals
Sun 9 Mar – Forum, Melbourne w/ Mirrors
Tue 11 Mar – Altar, Hobart w/ Mirrors
Thu 13 Mar – Uni Bar, Wollongong w/ Alienist
Fri 14 Mar – Drifters Wharf, Central Coast w/ Irken Armada
Sat 15 Mar – Metro Theatre, Sydney…
Lucas Radbourne
topics: Arts, Culture and Entertainment->arts and entertainment
